title: Julian Sturdy – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Julian Sturdy, the Conservative MP for York Outer, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
For the avoidance of doubt, my views have not changed since summer.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance

  *[DfE]: Department for education
  *[

Rishi [Sunak] has the experience we need to take our economy forward & bring stability to Govt. He has a strong track record of facing challenges head on & getting things done.
